verses.verse: Then <S%H935>came<s%> all the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> unto <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>, and <S%H559>spake<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H6106>Behold<s%>, we are thy bone and thy <S%H1320>flesh<s%>.

In times <S%H865>past<s%>, when <S%H7586>Saul<s%> was <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H3318>us<s%>, it was thou that leddest out and broughtest <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7462>thee<s%>, Thou shalt be shepherd of my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and thou shalt be <S%H5057>prince<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

So all the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> to <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>; and <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with them in <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: and they <S%H4886>anointed<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
David <S%H1732><s%> was <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign<s%>, and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.

In <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> over <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H2320>months<s%>; and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> over all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> and his <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> against the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%>, the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, who <S%H559>spake<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Except thou take <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H5787>blind<s%> and the <S%H6455>lame<s%>, thou shalt not come <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H559>hither<s%>; thinking, <S%H1732>David<s%> cannot come in <S%H935>hither<s%>.
Nevertheless <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3920>took<s%> the <S%H4686>stronghold<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>; the same is the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> on that <S%H3117>day<s%>, Whosoever <S%H5221>smiteth<s%> the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%>, let him get <S%H5060>up<s%> to the <S%H6794>watercourse<s%>, and smite the <S%H6455>lame<s%> and the <S%H5787>blind<s%>, that are <S%H8130>hated<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>'s <S%H5315>soul<s%>. Wherefore they <S%H559>say<s%>, There are the <S%H5787>blind<s%> and the <S%H6455>lame<s%>; he cannot <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H4686>stronghold<s%>, and <S%H7121>called<s%> it the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>. And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> from <S%H4407>Millo<s%> and <S%H1004>inward<s%>.
And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3212>waxed<s%> <S%H1419>greater<s%> and <S%H1980>greater<s%>; for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, was with him.

And <S%H2438>Hiram<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%>, <S%H730>and<s%> <S%H6086>cedar-trees<s%>, and <S%H2796>carpenters<s%>, and <S%H7023>masons<s%>; and they <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3045>perceived<s%> that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> had <S%H3559>established<s%> him <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and that he had <S%H5375>exalted<s%> his <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> for his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>'s sake.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> him more <S%H6370>concubines<s%> and <S%H802>wives<s%> out of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%H310>after<s%> he was <S%H935>come<s%> from <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>; and there were yet <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters<s%> <S%H3205>born<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%>.

And these are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of those that were <S%H3209>born<s%> unto him in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: <S%H8051>Shammua<s%>, and <S%H7727>Shobab<s%>, and <S%H5416>Nathan<s%>, and <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>,
and <S%H2984>Ibhar<s%>, and <S%H474>Elishua<s%>, and <S%H5298>Nepheg<s%>, and <S%H3309>Japhia<s%>,
and <S%H476>Elishama<s%>, and <S%H450>Eliada<s%>, and <S%H467>Eliphelet<s%>.

And when the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that they had <S%H4886>anointed<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, all the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>; and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of <S%H3381>it<s%>, and went down to the <S%H4686>stronghold<s%>.
Now the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> had <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H5203>spread<s%> themselves in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H7497>Rephaim<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7592>inquired<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Shall I go <S%H5927>up<s%> against the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>? wilt thou <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them into my <S%H3027>hand<s%>? And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%>, Go <S%H5927>up<s%>; for I will <S%H5414>certainly<s%> <S%H5414>deliver<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> into thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1188>Baal-perazim<s%>, and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> them <S%H559>there<s%>; and he said, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H6555>broken<s%> mine <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6556>me<s%>, like the breach of <S%H4325>waters<s%>. Therefore he <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of that <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H1188>Baal-perazim<s%>.
And they <S%H5800>left<s%> their <S%H6091>images<s%> <S%H1732>there<s%>; and David and his <S%H582>men<s%> took them <S%H5375>away<s%>.
And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> yet <S%H3254>again<s%>, and <S%H5203>spread<s%> themselves in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H7497>Rephaim<s%>.

And when <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7592>inquired<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, he <S%H559>said<s%>, Thou shalt not go <S%H5927>up<s%>: make a <S%H5437>circuit<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> <S%H935>them<s%>, and come upon them over <S%H4136>against<s%> the <S%H1057>mulberry-trees<s%>.

And it shall <S%H8085>be<s%>, when thou hearest the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of <S%H6807>marching<s%> in the <S%H7218>tops<s%> of the <S%H1057>mulberry-trees<s%>, that then thou shalt <S%H2782>bestir<s%> <S%H3068>thyself<s%>; for then is Jehovah gone <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee to <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H4264>host<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> did <S%H6213>so<s%>, as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H5221>him<s%>, and smote the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> from <S%H1387>Geba<s%> until thou <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H1507>Gezer<s%>.
